name: Tin Top's Ten-Win
description:
Entry for Nokia 3310 Jam 2 hosted by phillip.
Win 10 microgames in Tin Top's game show to win. But don't worry; losing's good in some ways (:

Programmed using Game Maker Studio 1.4
Sounds created using BeepBox.

And all you groovy daddies can check out my entry for the first Nokia 3310 Jam here:

Sub Buddy
